msg_main_menu.en:
Welcome to InnoWashing bot. With this bot you can: 
 - Find free washing machine or drier 
 - Get notified, when your washing or drying is finished.

msg_request_laundry_id.en: Please, enter laundry identifier (e.g. 42 means 4th building 2nd floor)

msg_notify_me.en:
Enter laundry id, which is a combination of building number, floor and order number. 
For instance, for 2nd building 3rd floor, 3rd device (from the door) it is 233.

msg_notification_created.en: Ok, you will be notified, when your process is finished.

msg_washing_started.en: Washing machine is unlocked. I will notify you, when washing is complete.

msg_notify_on_release.en: Ok, you will be notified when equipment will be released
